title: The Fifth Nail /// Part 1 /// 118
description:
The Fifth Nail /// Part 1 /// 118

Part 1 of 2

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Idaho – 2005, A family goes about their normal everyday activities. They didn’t know they were in the midst of a monster. For several nights he lurked outside their home watching them. He was waiting for the perfect time to strike. When he did the crime scene was so horrific law enforcement said it was a crime for which they had never seen. This week we feature a story that investigators called one of the worst in American history.

Beer of the Week - We Don't Need No Stinking Coast - by Sixth Sense Brewing Company Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps
